H0.text: In Greek mythology, who were the band of heroes who accompanied Jason to Colchis in his quest to find the Golden Fleece. Hellenes

H1.text: In Greek mythology, who were the band of heroes who accompanied Jason to Colchis in his quest to find the Golden Fleece. Olympians

H2.text: In Greek mythology, who were the band of heroes who accompanied Jason to Colchis in his quest to find the Golden Fleece. Centaurs

H3.text: In Greek mythology, who were the band of heroes who accompanied Jason to Colchis in his quest to find the Golden Fleece. Argonaut

A4.text: The Argonauts were a band of heroes in Greek mythology, who in the years before the Trojan War (around 1300 BC) accompanied Jason to Colchis in his quest to find the Golden Fleece.

A5.text: The Argonauts were sometimes called Minyans, after a prehistoric tribe in the area.
